sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '01' THEN '기관' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '02' THEN '부서' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '03' THEN '코드' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '04' THEN '사용자' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '05' THEN '기관코드등록변경요청' ELSE T1.JOBCODE END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IS_ORG_DEPTETC T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IS_ORG_DEPTETC WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '01' THEN '처분요구사항' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '02' THEN '관계자' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '03' THEN '감사자' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '04' THEN '처분요구사항상세' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '05' THEN '관계기관' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '06' THEN '회계사항' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '07' THEN '소관기관' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '08' THEN '감사사항' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '09' THEN '국과별감사처리' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '10' THEN '처분요구요약전' ELSE T1.JOBCODE END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IS_REQINFO T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IS_REQINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '01' THEN '집행전말기본' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '02' THEN '집행전말이력' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '03' THEN '집행단계별계획' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '04' THEN '집행전말관계기관기본변경' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '05' THEN '집행전말관계자기본변경' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '06' THEN '특수관리기본' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '07' THEN '특수관리집행내역' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '08' THEN '' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '09' THEN '통보사항기본삭제내역' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '10' THEN '' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '11' THEN '집행전말기본삭제이력(삭제전문)' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '12' THEN '집행전말기본삭제이력' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '13' THEN '집행단계별계획삭제이력' ELSE T1.JOBCODE END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IS_UPDATEINFO T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IS_UPDATEINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '01' THEN '공지사항' ELSE T1.JOBCODE END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IS_NOTIINFO T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IS_NOTIINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,'' AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IS_TBDCMIDM001L T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IS_TBDCMIDM001L WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,'' AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_REQDOC_MANUAL T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_REQDOC_MANUAL WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,'' AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_REQDOC_BATCH T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_REQDOC_BATCH WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '201' THEN '범죄' WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '202' THEN '징계' WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '203' THEN '손망실훼손' WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '301' THEN '집행전말' ELSE T1.APSECTCD END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_BAIRPT_MANUAL T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.APSECTCD = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.APSECTCD ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.APSECTCD ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_BAIRPT_MANUAL WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND APSECTCD = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '201' THEN '범죄' WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '202' THEN '징계' WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '203' THEN '손망실훼손' WHEN T1.APSECTCD = '301' THEN '집행전말' ELSE T1.APSECTCD END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_BAIRPT_BATCH T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.APSECTCD = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.APSECTCD ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.APSECTCD ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_BAIRPT_BATCH WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND APSECTCD = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '01' THEN '기관코드신청' WHEN T1.JOBCODE = '02' THEN '기관코드직접입력' ELSE T1.JOBCODE END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_ORG_USERETC T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.JOBCODE ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_ORG_USERETC WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND JOBCODE = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,'' AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_ORGHANDBOOK T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_ORGHANDBOOK WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD = '100' THEN '계약체결사항' WHEN T1.LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD = '200' THEN '국유재산교환' ELSE T1.LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_REL_LAW_NTF T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_REL_LAW_NTF WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND LAW_NTF_DVSN_CD = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CASE WHEN T1.CON_MNU_ID = 'aa.ina.AdActMng' THEN '처분요구' WHEN T1.CON_MNU_ID = 'ni.crn.CrimNoti' THEN '범죄' WHEN T1.CON_MNU_ID = 'ni.dcn.DiscipNt' THEN '징계' WHEN T1.CON_MNU_ID = 'ni.ldn.LosDmgNt' THEN '손망실' ELSE T1.CON_MNU_ID END AS CON_DVSN ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM IR_JUMINNOINFO T1 WHERE SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND T1.CON_MNU_ID = #strCbb#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) ,T1.CON_MNU_ID ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY SUBSTR(T1.CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) DESC ,T1.CON_MNU_ID ,T1.CM_PROCESS_STATUS

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IR_JUMINNOINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
AND CON_MNU_ID = #strCbb#
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ORDER BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS DESC ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT A.CON_DT AS CON_DT ,A.IF_ID AS IF_ID ,A.CON_TIT AS CON_TIT ,A.CON_RSLT AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'기관정보기본' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGINFOBASIC WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'수감기관기본' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADTEE WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'구기관코드관리' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_SCMOLDORGMNG WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'대상기관정보' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사기구편제(조직,예산)' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADOGAFOMA WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사기구장' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADOGAHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사기구감사대상정보' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADOGAOBJINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'감사담당자명부' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADTORINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'역대기관장' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGINFOHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'기관임원정보' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGBDMEMINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사계획' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADMASTER WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사실시' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADPOSTCTL WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사결과' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADDISPREQ WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
) A WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.CON_DT ,A.IF_ID ,A.CON_TIT ,A.CON_RSLT ORDER BY A.CON_DT DESC ,A.IF_ID

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGINFOBASIC WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADTEE WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_SCMOLDORGMNG WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADOGAFOMA WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADOGAHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADOGAOBJINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADTORINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGINFOHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGBDMEMINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADMASTER WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADPOSTCTL WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
UNION ALL
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADDISPREQ WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd# )
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1

SELECT A.CON_DT AS CON_DT ,A.IF_ID AS IF_ID ,A.CON_TIT AS CON_TIT ,A.CON_RSLT AS CON_RSLT ,COUNT(1) AS CON_RSLT_CNT FROM (
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'기관정보기본' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGINFOBASIC WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'수감기관기본' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADTEE WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'구기관코드관리' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_SCMOLDORGMNG WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'대상기관정보' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사기구편제(조직,예산)' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADOGAFOMA WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사기구장' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADOGAHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사기구감사대상정보' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADOGAOBJINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'감사담당자명부' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADTORINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'역대기관장' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGINFOHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'기관임원정보' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_ORGBDMEMINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사계획' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADMASTER WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사실시' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADPOSTCTL WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT SUBSTR(CM_TRNS_ID,0,11) AS IF_ID ,'자체감사결과' AS CON_TIT ,SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) AS CON_DT ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CON_RSLT FROM IR_INTADDISPREQ WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
) A WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.CON_DT ,A.IF_ID ,A.CON_TIT ,A.CON_RSLT ORDER BY A.CON_DT DESC ,A.IF_ID

SELECT MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH ('['||CM_PROCESS_STATUS || ':' || CNT ||']', ' ') ) AS INFO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX ,CM_PROCESS_STATUS AS CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,CNT AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGINFOBASIC WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADTEE WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_SCMOLDORGMNG WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADOGAFOMA WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADOGAHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADOGAOBJINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADTORINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGINFOHEAD WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_ORGBDMEMINFO WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADMASTER WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADPOSTCTL WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
SELECT CM_PROCESS_STATUS FROM IR_INTADDISPREQ WHERE SUBSTR(CM_SEND_RCV_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #strConDtStr# AND #strConDtEnd#
)
GROUP BY CM_PROCESS_STATUS ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX = IDX-1 START WITH IDX = 1
